name: elm-tutorial
description: Source code for a tutorial on building web applications

scripts.clean-build: rm -rf elm-stuff; elm package install -y; elm make ./src/Main.elm --output=app.js;
scripts.test: cd tests; elm package install -y; elm make ./Test.elm --output=test.js; node -r ./mock-document ./test.js; cd ..;

author: Kevin Greene <hightimesteddy@gmail.com>
